Uses of Interface
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.Container

  • Packages that use Container 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents
    Contains the core components of the WComponent framework.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor
    Contains the classes used for providing statics about the user context.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.render.webxml
    Provides a rendering format used to output a WComponent UI for use within a web-browser.

    • Uses of Container in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

      Subinterfaces of Container in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableContainer
      The interface for Containers which can have content added/removed.
      interface  NamingContextable
      This interface is used to mark components which hold a name context.
      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that implement Container 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContainer
      This abstract implements the Container interface to expose methods for retrieving the contents of the container.
      class  AbstractMutableContainer
      This abstract class extends AbstractContainer and implements the MutableContainer interface to expose methods for modifying the contents of a container.
      class  AbstractNamingContextContainer
      This abstract container implements NamingContextable.
      class  AbstractTransientDataContainer
      AbstractTransientContextContainer ensures that all child components have transient state - ie will have their UI contexts reset after each request.
      class  DefaultTransientDataContainer
      A default implementation of AbstractTransientDataContainer that doesn't provide any data.
      class  UicProfileButton
      Deprecated. 
      1.1.4 This is NOT a core component and will be deleted ASAP.
      class  WAjaxPollingRegion
      Deprecated. 
      1.2.0 This component is too abstract which leads to severe accessibility issues under common conditions and should have been an implementation example. See https://github.com/BorderTech/wcomponents/wiki/WAjaxPollingRegion.
      class  WApplication
      This component must be used as the top level component for an application.
      class  WBeanContainer
      Deprecated. 
      Use WContainer instead.
      class  WButton
      A WButton is used to submit the contents of the form to the server.
      class  WCancelButton
      This component is a specialised version of a WButton that provides additional client-side functionality commonly associated with a "cancel" button.
      class  WCardManager
      A WCardManager is a wcomponent used to control the visibility of its child components.
      class  WCollapsible
      The WCollapsible component enables a given component to be expanded/collapsed (shown/hidden) via clicking on the collapsible's header section.
      class  WColumn
      This is a layout component to be used in conjunction with WRow.
      class  WColumnLayout
      This component is used to group together two components into a two column (left and right) display.
      class  WConfirmationButton
      This component is a specialised version of a WButton that provides additional client-side functionality commonly associated with a "cancel" button.
      class  WContainer
      A default implementation of the Container interface.
      class  WContentLink
      WContentLink is a convenience class to configure a WLink to display content, such as a pdf, that is rendered by WContent.
      class  WDataRenderer
      This class is a convenience WComponent that is bound to a data object.
      class  WDataTable
      Deprecated. 
      Use WTable instead.
      class  WDataTableRowRenderer
      Deprecated. 
      Use WTable and WTableRowRenderer instead.
      class  WDecoratedLabel
      WDecorated is a "decorated label" which is typically displayed inside other components, for example WTab.
      class  WDefinitionList
      WDefinitionList is used to render pair lists of terms/data.
      class  WDialog
      WDialog is used to display pop-up content.
      class  WField
      This component is used to aggregate the common elements that are used to display an editable field (ie, the label, the field itself and an error indicator).
      class  WFieldLayout
      This component is used to group together a collection of WField components to provide a consistent layout template.
      class  WFieldSet
      WFieldSet is used to logically group together input fields.
      class  WFigure
      WFigure represents a container that is used to associate a large graphical element with its text description.
      class  WHeading
      This component is used to render the different types of headings within an application.
      class  WInvisibleContainer
      This container is used as a marker for some special cases, where we want to skip normal WComponent life-cycle processes.
      class  WLabel
      The WLabel component is used to display a textual label for an input field.
      class  WLink
      Note that WLink is different to WButton rendered as a link because WLink will not post the form, and does not support Actions.
      class  WList
      This component is an extension of a WRepeater that is used to render a collection of items as a list.
      class  WMenu
      This component enables rendering of a menuing system for an application.
      class  WMenuItem
      This component provides a menu item for use either directly in the top level of a WMenu or as an item within a WSubMenu or WMenuItemGroup.
      class  WMenuItemGroup
      Deprecated. 
      menu groups are not compatible with WCAG 2.0.
      class  WMessages
      WMessages provides a convenient wrapper for the WMessageBox and WValidationErrors components, and lets the developer use a "singleton" WMessages instance per application.
      class  WNamingContext
      A container that provides a NamingContextable for its children's ids.
      class  WPanel
      A WPanel is used to group components together.
      class  WPrintButton
      Deprecated. 
      class  WRepeater
      When you have a situation where you have a list of a repeated data type that you want to render or edit, then this ui component can help.
      static class  WRepeater.WRepeatRoot
      Component to hold the repeated component and provide the correct row data.
      class  WRow
      This is a layout component, to which you add WColumn components.
      class  WSection
      The WSection component defines a major discrete section of a screen which is associated with, and described by, a heading.
      class  WSubMenu
      This component is used to provide either a dropmenu (when added directly to a WMenu or nestable sub menus (when added to another WSubMenu instance).
      class  WTab
      WTab encapsulates a tab on a tab set.
      class  WTabGroup
      Deprecated. 
      No replacement: must not be used as causes accessibility failure.
      class  WTable
      The WTable component is used to display tabular data.
      static class  WTable.TableRepeater
      This repeater extension is necessary to ensure that tree-tables are painted correctly.
      class  WTableColumn
      WTableColumn represents a column in a WDataTable.
      class  WTableRepeater
      Deprecated. 
      Use WTable instead.
      class  WTableRowRenderer
      WTableRowRenderer is used by the table's repeater to render row data.
      class  WTabSet
      This component enables rendering of a set of tabbed components.
      class  WTemplate
      Allows the use of custom templates to layout components, insert custom css and javascript.
      class  WWindow
      This component enables a pop up browser window with interactive wcomponent content.
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that return Container 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Container WComponent.getParent() 
      protected Container ComponentModel.getParent() 
      Container AbstractWComponent.getParent() 
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents with parameters of type Container 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ComponentModel.setParent(Container parent) 

    • Uses of Container in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor that implement Container 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProfileContainer
      An extension of WContainer that renders some statistics after its normal output.

    • Uses of Container in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.render.webxml

      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.render.webxml with parameters of type Container 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void AbstractWebXmlRenderer.paintChildren(Container container, WebXmlRenderContext renderContext)
      Paints the children of the given component.
